results.title: Simvastatin reduces venous stenosis formation in a murine hemodialysis vascular access model
results.text_hl: Therefore, 62 @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ comprise this study (Figure 1a and b). Either 40 mg/g of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (SV, n=35) or phosphate-buffered saline only (control, C, n=27) was given intraperitoneally every other day starting 1 week before @<m>DISEASE_Fistula</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005402 @@@fistula@@@ placement until the time of killing (Figure 1c).
